snippet: Since Comptroller Susan Combs announced that she would not seek re-election, prospective candidates have been turning up, and as many as six statewide positions may be open in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Since Comptroller Susan Combs announced that she would not seek re-election, prospective candidates have been turning up, and as many as six statewide positions may be open in 2014.

headline.seo: Ready to Run for Office in Texas? Get in Line
headline.main: Ready to Run for State Office? Get in Line
headline.print_headline: Ready to Run For State Office? Get in Line
